solution_line_template: Robbie gets {rice_morning} x {fat_per_cup} = <<{rice_morning}*{fat_per_cup}={fat_morning}>>{fat_morning} grams of fat every morning.
He gets {fat_per_cup} x {rice_afternoon} = <<{fat_per_cup}*{rice_afternoon}={fat_afternoon}>>{fat_afternoon} grams of fat every afternoon.
And he gets {rice_evening} x {fat_per_cup} = <<{rice_evening}*{fat_per_cup}={fat_evening}>>{fat_evening} grams of fat every evening.
So, the total grams of fat he gets every day is {fat_evening} + {fat_morning} + {fat_afternoon} = <<{fat_evening}+{fat_morning}+{fat_afternoon}={fat_per_day}>>{fat_per_day}.
Therefore, the total grams of fat he gets every week is {fat_per_day} x {days_per_week} = <<{fat_per_day}*{days_per_week}={fat_per_week}>>{fat_per_week}.
